text: The 2012 WAFF Championship is an international football tournament held in Kuwait from 8 to 20 December 2012. The 11 national teams involved in the tournament were required to register a squad of 23 players, including three goalkeepers. Only players in these squads were eligible to take part in the tournament. ==Group A== ===Kuwait=== Coach: ===Oman=== Coach: ===Lebanon=== Coach: ===Palestine=== Coach: ==Group B== ===Iran=== Coach: ===Saudi Arabia=== Coach: ===Bahrain=== Coach: ===Yemen=== Coach: ==Group C== ===Iraq=== Coach: Hakim Shaker http://www.the-waff.com/assets/attach/48_1075.pdf ===Jordan=== Coach: ===Syria=== Coach: Hussam Al Sayed http://www.the- waff.com/assets/attach/48_1165.pdf ==References== Squads Category:WAFF Championship squads
